text: "Yah Mo B There" is a 1983 song by James Ingram featuring Michael McDonald. It was taken from his debut studio album It's Your Night. It went to number 19 in the United States and number 12 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. Ingram and McDonald won a best duo or group Grammy Award for their performance of the song. Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:James Ingram songs Category:Michael McDonald (musician) songs
title: Yah Mo B There
